explosive module¶

class explosive.Explosive(file_name, rect, frame_rate, angle, pos, groups, power, damage, collidables)¶

Bases: projectile.Projectile

A class for any weapon that has the ability to explode.

Parameters:
  • file_name – The file to load for the surface.
  • rect – The size of the explosive weapon.
  • frame_rate – The frame rate to play the animation at.
  • angle – Will get passed to projectile.
  • pos – The position of the explosive weapon.
  • groups – A sprite.Group of all player objects.
  • power – The launch power of the explosive weapon.
  • damage – The amount of damage the explosive does to a player
  • collidables – Sprites that the Explosive can collide with
collision_check()¶
Looks to see if the explosive projectile has collided with anything.
If it has, then remove the projectile, and draw an elipse to represent the blast of the explosion.
Parameters:collidables – The objects that an explosion can collide with.
update(world)¶

Update the explosive weapon. :param world: The world in which the explosive exists.
